GINCCO_lib.time_series_plot module¶

GINCCO_lib.time_series_plot.choose_locator(tstart, tend)[source]¶
GINCCO_lib.time_series_plot.plot_point(title, tstart, tend, data_point, path_save='.', name_save='figure', point_labels=None)[source]¶

Plot daily time series for multiple points.

Tick rules:

  • <= 100 days: daily ticks, format YYYYMMdd

  • <= 500 days: monthly ticks, format YYYYMM

  • > 500 days: yearly ticks, format YYYY

Always show ~4–7 ticks for readability.

GINCCO_lib.time_series_plot.plot_point_monthly(title, time_label, data_point, n_xticks_desired=6, path_save='.', name_save='figure', point_labels=None)[source]¶

Plot monthly time series for one or many points. - x axis uses ‘time_label’ directly - the number of ticks is chosen to be ‘nice’ and near n_xticks_desired - always includes the last month as a tick
